text: Ta koly vony zustrichayutʹ viruyuchiv, yak kazhutʹ, "My vvazhayemo, "ale koly vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ razom z odyn odnoho, yak kazhutʹ, "Ne informuyutʹ (viruyuchi) informatsiyi danoyi vam BOHOM, lest vy zabezpechuyete yikh z pidtrymkoyu dlya yikhnʹoho arhumentu shchodo vashoho Lorda. Vy ne rozumiyete
